price: Ey kafir olanlar! Bu gün üzr diləməyin. Siz ancaq etdiyiniz əməllərin cəzasını çəkəcəksiniz!
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna kafarū lā taʿtadhirū al-yawma innamā tuj'zawna mā kuntum taʿmalūna
